title: Intent makes all the difference
excerpt: Batman is the story of a man’s intent to clean up a corrupt city without resorting to the same sort of behavior that made it so villainous in the first place.

children.text: Batman is the story of a man’s intent to clean up a corrupt city without resorting to the same sort of behavior that made it so villainous in the first place.
That’s what makes Batman Batman. Otherwise, he'd be another rich thug.
Nevermind that this is striking example of what we
see in politics today (but should), it’s an important reminder.
Everything begins with intent. The intent to make a difference, to change something for the better or worse.
